instructions: Boil meat and remove the dirt.
Drain the water and rinse the meat. Rinse the pot and return the meat to the pot with new water.
Specializes in putting meat on hummus.
Let it boil a little to see if there is any dirt.
Place potatoes on top of the meat.
Spices: saffron, white pepper, nutmeg (a drop), a little paprika, cinnamon, chicken broth, salt.
Cover everything with water and boil well, then reduce to a simmer for an hour and a half until cooked through.
Boil sugar with a little water, burn it a little so that it becomes very hot, but not too hot, then put it in the hot pot with gloves and away from your face.
Wheat is brought in before Shabbat (and before that I check that the bag is good).
On the plate and before going to bed, watch as the bag inflates and make small holes in the bag at the top.
